game.name: Nice City
game.shortDescription: ]Nice City에 오신 것을 환영합니다.これは美しく作られた、感動的なストーリーの三人称オープンワールドシューティングゲームです。ここは民風が淳朴で、地霊人傑–もし奇妙な奴に遭遇したら、それは「Return to Campus」(キャンパスへの帰還)から穿越してきたのかもしれません。
game.shortDescriptionEn: Welcome to Nice City. This is a beautifully crafted, emotionally rich third-person open-world shooter. The people here are simple and honest, the place is endowed with fine spirits – if you encounter any strange characters, they might have traveled from "Return to Campus".
